thread.title: Donald Trump Is Just Mad That Sean Spicer Got Owned by a Lady on 'SNL'
thread.title_full: Donald Trump Is Just Mad That Sean Spicer Got Owned by a Lady on 'SNL'

title: Donald Trump Is Just Mad That Sean Spicer Got Owned by a Lady on 'SNL'
text:
Donald Trump Is Just Mad That Sean Spicer Got Owned by a Lady on 'SNL' 
The president reportedly "doesn't like his people to look weak." Most Popular By Mattie Kahn Feb 7, 2017 President Donald Trump, a lover of cable television and the cropped-bathrobe look , is reportedly displeased that Sean Spicer was not only eviscerated, but burned to the ground by a woman on Saturday Night Live this week . Who is surprised? According to Politico , Trump was less irritated that the skit made Spicer look like a compulsive liar "who makes up facts" and more that it was a woman who pulled it off. Apparently, he was so irked that sources claimed "the unflattering send-up by a female comedian was not considered helpful for Spicer's longevity in the grueling, high-profile job." Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Which...if all it takes for a man in this administration to get the boot is a hilarious woman in a bad suit, maybe we need to rethink our tactics. Forget harassing senators! Start sending faxes, emails, letters, delegations, and deep-sea flares to bookers on SNL ! One volunteer has already volunteered: Most Popular Meanwhile, a Trump donor added that the president "doesn't like his people to look weak," suggesting that it's somehow extra debilitating to be lampooned by a woman . This is a bad opinion, of course! Women aren't weak. A man shouldn't be fired just because a woman put on a wig, pushed her hairline all the way back , and dressed up in a terrible suit to wipe the floor with him on national television. But I do just want to point out that, if we're being honest, this is the fiercest, the brawniest, and for sure the sexiest Sean Spicer has ever looked. SNL
